cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplatePlainText:
Pages have been submitted for translation. The source text and instructions are enclosed in a ZIP file.
This submission was created with priority {% GetTranslationPriority(Submission.SubmissionPriority) |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)6d8ae69759047890b5bb724fff2221b20e14d9f1faffa5d032e5385a91bf9c5c%} and is due by {% Submission.SubmissionDeadline |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)0a4083d71995409b44f9fd8faee916549cf206b87821eda636ade9d243419d38%}.
To upload a ZIP archive with the completed translation, go to the following URL {% SubmissionLink %}.
